title: Pseudo Entropy in dS/CFT and Time-like Entanglement Entropy. (arXiv:2210.09457v2 [hep-th] UPDATED)
description: We study holographic entanglement entropy in dS/CFT and introduce time-like entanglement entropy in CFTs. Both of them take complex values in general and are related with each other via an analytical continuation. We argue that they are correctly understood as pseudo entropy. We find that the imaginary part of pseudo entropy implies an emergence of time in dS/CFT.
